verbose_text: However, its predictive value is still unsatisfactory because of various limitations, including inter- and intra-tumor heterogeneous PD-L1 expression, use of PD-1 / PD-L1 specific mAbs displaying a substantially different reactivity, different diagnostic material (biopsies vs. surgical specimens).
evidence: limitations, including inter- and intra-tumor heterogeneous PD-L1 expression, use of PD-1/PD-L1
